+ Menu Help

++ Open help wiki
Opens this help wiki in a new window.

++ Visit Homepage
Launches the homepage of WikidPad in your default browser.

++ Show License
Shows the license of WikidPad.

++ About
Shows the version of the WikidPad software, and some more useful information.
